attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned encourage the Government of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, to condemn the proposed piece of US legislation. The Cyber Intelligence Sharing and Protection Act , or CISPA for short has been widely criticised as intrusive and fundamentally flawed. By allowing the US to sign such legislation with no condemnation, the UK will be approving of Draconian observation of an entire population; something it has readily criticised in China and Iran
